command.description: Update UI tests, e.g. after a rust toolchain upgrade, and commit them to your PR.

default.description: Update substrate UI tests in Monorepo/substrate with current rust version

latest.description: Update substrate UI tests in Monorepo/substrate for latest rust version. You might also want to override an image like `bot update-ui latest -v CMD_IMAGE=paritytech/ci-unified:bullseye-1.70.0-2023-05-23 --rust_version=1.70.0`
